title: How to Draw Hello Kitty (And Make Her Totally Cute)

steps.title: Draw a large oval for the head.
steps.content: Draw a large oval for the head. Make sure you add in guidelines in the center of the oval for the eyes and nose: they are very helpful to draw the facial features. They should cross as seen, so you can use them in the next step when you add those features.

steps.title: Sketch in two ovals for the eyes.
steps.content: Sketch in two ovals for the eyes. Between and below them, draw another small oval for her nose.

steps.title: Add two triangles for the ears, and three lines in each cheek for the whiskers.
steps.content: Add two triangles for the ears, and three lines in each cheek for the whiskers. They can vary in length and flair; the usual style is shown here.

steps.title: At the left ear, start drawing her ribbon.
steps.content: At the left ear, start drawing her ribbon. Draw a large circle and two small circles on each side overlapping the large one. Draw two triangles in each side of the circle with curved sides.

steps.title: Draw a large, round-edged triangle.
steps.content: Draw a large, round-edged triangle. Draw two ovals for the feet.

steps.title: For the arms, draw ovals for each.
steps.content: For the arms, draw ovals for each. Don't forget two circles for her thumb! Hello Kitty doesn't really have fingers, like a human, or paws, like a cat; her look is unique to her, so try hard to get it right.

steps.title: Add in her clothes.
steps.content: Add in her clothes. She usually wears a jumper and a shirt. (You can dress her in any kind of clothing you’d like, though!)

steps.title: Outline the image.
steps.content: Outline the image. Erase the guidelines and any other unnecessary marks.now your hello kitty's basic sketch is ready!!

steps.title: Color in your drawing.
steps.content: Color in your drawing. Use primarily shades of pink, with a dot of yellow for her nose and darker eyes/whiskers. You're done!

steps.title: Draw an oblong which matches the big head of Hello Kitty.
steps.content: Draw an oblong which matches the big head of Hello Kitty.

steps.title: Draw a purse-shape below the oblong.
steps.content: Draw a purse-shape below the oblong. Draw a vertical line at the middle of the two shapes.

steps.title: Draw the hands or arms using curve lines.
steps.content: Draw the hands or arms using curve lines. Draw small circles in each arm.

steps.title: Draw lines in the body for the clothes.
steps.content: Draw lines in the body for the clothes.

steps.title: Draw details for Hello Kitty’s ears, eyes, nose, and whiskers.
steps.content: Draw details for Hello Kitty’s ears, eyes, nose, and whiskers.

steps.title: Draw a flower at the right upper part of the head.
steps.content: Draw a flower at the right upper part of the head.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
